data.name: qryQuery.SelectStatement
data.value:
DECLARE @LanguageCode INT; SET @LanguageCode = {0};
DECLARE @Person TABLE ( BaPersonID INT, FUserID INT, SUserID INT, IUserID INT, VUserID INT, AUserID INT )
DECLARE @Fall TABLE ( BaPersonID INT, ModulID INT, UserID INT, DatumVon DATETIME, DatumBis DATETIME )
INSERT INTO @Fall (BaPersonID, ModulID, UserID, DatumVon, DatumBis) SELECT BaPersonID, ModulID, UserID, DatumVon, DatumBis FROM FaLeistung WHERE 1 = 0 --- OR (YEAR(DatumVon) <= {edtAuswertungsjahr} AND (YEAR(CASE WHEN {chk6MonateRegel} = 1 THEN DATEADD(MONTH, 5, DatumBis) ELSE DatumBis END) >= {edtAuswertungsjahr} OR DatumBis IS NULL --- )) -- {edtAuswertungsjahr}
INSERT INTO @Person (BaPersonID) SELECT DISTINCT BaPersonID FROM @Fall
UPDATE P SET FUserID = (SELECT TOP 1 FAL.UserID FROM FaLeistung FAL WHERE FAL.BaPersonID = P.BaPersonID AND FAL.ModulID = 2 ORDER BY FAL.DatumVon DESC), SUserID = (SELECT TOP 1 FAL.UserID FROM FaLeistung FAL WHERE FAL.BaPersonID = P.BaPersonID AND FAL.ModulID = 3 ORDER BY FAL.DatumVon DESC), IUserID = (SELECT TOP 1 FAL.UserID FROM FaLeistung FAL WHERE FAL.BaPersonID = P.BaPersonID AND FAL.ModulID = 4 ORDER BY FAL.DatumVon DESC), VUserID = (SELECT TOP 1 FAL.UserID FROM FaLeistung FAL WHERE FAL.BaPersonID = P.BaPersonID AND FAL.ModulID = 5 ORDER BY FAL.DatumVon DESC), AUserID = (SELECT TOP 1 FAL.UserID FROM FaLeistung FAL WHERE FAL.BaPersonID = P.BaPersonID and FAL.ModulID = 6 ORDER BY FAL.DatumVon DESC) FROM @Person P
select Person = PRS.NameVorname, [SAR Fallführung] = F.LastName + isNull(', ' + F.FirstName,''), [SAR Sozialhilfe] = S.LastName + isNull(', ' + S.FirstName,''), [SAR Inkasso] = I.LastName + isNull(', ' + I.FirstName,''), [SAR Vormundschaft] = V.LastName + isNull(', ' + V.FirstName,''), [SAR Asyl] = A.LastName + isNull(', ' + A.FirstName,''), Zusatz = PRS.NavigatorZusatz, AHVNummer = PRS.AHVNummer, NNummer = PRS.NNummer, Geburtsdatum = PRS.Geburtsdatum, Geschlecht = CASE PRS.GeschlechtCode WHEN 1 THEN 'm' WHEN 2 THEN 'f' ELSE '?' END, Strasse = PRS.WohnsitzStrasse, StrasseNr = PRS.WohnsitzHausNr, PLZ = PRS.WohnsitzPLZ, Ort = PRS.WohnsitzOrt, Kanton = PRS.WohnsitzKanton, Zivilstand = dbo.fnLOVMLText('Zivilstand', PRS.ZivilstandCode, @LanguageCode), Nationalität = CASE @LanguageCode WHEN 1 THEN PRS.Nationalitaet WHEN 2 THEN PRS.NationalitaetFR WHEN 3 THEN PRS.NationalitaetIT END, Heimatort = PRS.Heimatort, [Zuständige Gemeinde] = (SELECT TOP 1 dbo.fnLOVMLText('GemeindeSozialdienst', FAL.GemeindeCode, @LanguageCode) FROM FaLeistung FAL), BaPersonID$ = PRS.BaPersonID FROM @Person P INNER JOIN vwPerson PRS ON PRS.BaPersonID = P.BaPersonID LEFT JOIN XUser F ON F.UserID = P.FUserID LEFT JOIN XUser S ON S.UserID = P.SUserID LEFT JOIN XUser I ON I.UserID = P.IUserID LEFT JOIN XUser V ON V.UserID = P.VUserID LEFT JOIN XUser A ON A.UserID = P.AUserID WHERE 1 = 1 AND (PRS.PersonSichtbarSDFlag = dbo.fnGetPersonSichtbarFlag(1) OR PRS.PersonSichtbarSDFlag = 1) --- and {edtSAR} in (FUserID,SUserID,IUSerID,VUserID,AUserID) --- and PRS.Name + isNull(', ' + PRS.Vorname,'') like {edtKlient} + '%'
